title: James Wilkinson

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose a faction to talk to. You join all of their factional night chats. You can switch factions you talk to. You can't talk to Town unless a Town Power role has a night chat (ie: jailor), where you will join the conversation.
- At night, choose any number of players to Arm. Each night, Armed players can choose a player to send a soldier to deal an astral attack to instead of doing their night ability. This exhausts the soldier for 3 nights.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have 2 soldiers at the start of the game.
- Exhausted soldiers cannot be sent out to attack.
- Selecting already Armed players will instead disarm them.
- Whenever a player from the faction you were talking to dies, you gain another soldier. If you have 4 soldiers, you can start using them to attack players.
- You are not anonymous in any factional chat you join.
- While you are present, if a good faction is present, their strongest member (typically power roles or killing roles if no power roles are present) will gain the ability to chat with another player anonymously at night. They choose who to talk with during the day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to the end of the game with 4+ soldiers.
